title: Screensaver doesn't work
body:
Not sure where to put this feedback, so hopefully this gets seen/is in the right spot.

When trying to preview the screensaver it turns the screen black and the program freezes up, you need to run task manager and force it to shut. It also never activates once set up. (I'm running Windows 7, if that is relevant)

replies.body: Yea, I'm having the same problem here on Windows 10, I can't seem to find a solution for this

Hey there,

All is working fine for me on Windows 10, have you opened the settings for the screensaver at least once before attempting to preview it so all files can be downloaded?

Yeah, I went through and chose all my images. Though the first time, the program froze up on me and went black (had it open for about 40 minutes I'd say), and I had to force close it and then select them again.
